summary: Full-stack developer with 8 years of experience, specializing in Python microservices and Google Cloud Platform. Highly proficient in building scalable, real-time applications using Cloud Run, Pub/Sub, and Firestore. I have a strong portfolio of functional demos and technical articles. My primary impact has been in modernizing supply chain logistics.

projects.name: Real-Time Inventory Tracker
projects.details: Deployed a microservice on Cloud Run using Flask and Gunicorn. It processes streaming inventory data via Pub/Sub and stores state in Firestore. Used Vertex AI for predictive demand forecasting (Google AI Usage). The architecture is documented in a three-part technical blog series (Blog Excellence).

projects.name: Logistics Route Optimizer
projects.details: Developed an ETL pipeline that cleans and aggregates massive geospatial data in BigQuery for route optimization models. The resulting application is used by a major European logistics firm, reducing their fleet mileage by 15% (Impact Score).
